A simple note app, pages and screen adaptation are supported,  the note contents can be sent from mobile througt bluetooth just using the Connect IQ APP.

简单的笔记应用，支持分页与屏幕适配，只需要蓝牙连接手机即可通过Connect IQ APP发送笔记内容

With this hand, I will lift your sorrows. Your cup will never empty, for I will be your wine. With this candle, I'll light your way in darkness. With this ring, I ask you to be mine. 


TODO:
英文排版bug √
设备兼容 √
每次蓝牙发送数据后重新初始化 √
app图标 √

Cover Image will be displayed on your Connect IQ Store listing. Image must be a JPG, GIF or PNG less than 150 KB.

https://apps.gairmin.com/en-US/developer/upload
